short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you click the button it goes WHAT ARE YOU DOING!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When installing this extension, it puts a button to the right of the omnibox which is used for fun. When clicked it plays "WHATAREYOUDOING" and shows a little picture of "Robbie Rotten". Its really funny when played at the right` time. ;)
